title: Tropical Africa
creator_credit: William L. Claiborne, Julien Bryan and International Film Foundation
brief_description: An account of the forces that are transforming tribal societies into modern states. The struggle for self government, the effort to establish schools, universities and hospitals as well as the rapidly changing agriculture, industries and communications; relationship between black and white African. Deals with the area south of the Sahara.
